topic.title: The world populations needs to be controlled.
topic.body: It's going out of hands. We need a selective global genocide or some sort of fertility control. And i don't mean killing babies, i mean a way to control the probability. Every single leader has to decide what is more important. The country or the humanity.

1562356977_1CKTRBy9N4RvE3FgeZJpQqFYtLHc3.body:
> [madroad](#comment_7_1LTyhYhYUFzBnX3YDeemKeDnFSncCUnPRa): You are still a freshmen on Zero... With an opinion. That's all it is.. A opinion...

an*

1562414209_1CvZDPgKk2p8Uk1ZfJ3hcZb1DzuNJ.body:
> [xcape2net](#comment_88_1GJc2vm4vJjAKsFoFJ2D3gGmKiRac2kfnz): This is politically impossible in democracies.

Then we need to abolish Democracy and have 1 and only Ruler. Of course we need to think about stopping him. And to do that we'll form an organization that controls his funds. Secret or not, doesn't matter.

> [qspitzer](#comment_23_1Hc87xHmLsZyaGTQYnx2UmQPKwE1EmgxKX): Thanos had a pretty good solution...

No. That was random. I'm talking about protecting the genetically superior group. Not a race, cause there are no races.

> [redlibertyreal](#comment_15_1D6UcmziWg55aXV6TnCksXpjsFJ4gDK6Kw): Very well, those who agree with OP can go first.

Why so rude?
